successes.title: tinyTesla: the Little Singing Tesla Coil Anyone Can Build
successes.description: Learn electronics, shoot lightning, and play music using electricity with tinyTesla! Also introducing oneTeslaTS, its big brother.

Pledges.description: Thank you from the oneTesla team! Get a chance to view backer exclusive updates, vote on packaging design, and have your name displayed on our website as a supporter of engineering education.
You're awesome! To show our appreciation for your support, we'll mail you a "Danger High Voltage" sticker. You will also get the rewards from the $5 level.
You're electrifying! At this reward tier you'll receive all of the above rewards plus a graphic tee so that you can show off your support for the DIY movement and hands-on electrical engineering!

This reward gets you an interrupter with SD card support, perfect for your own Tesla coil or for upgrading your existing oneTesla kit to have SD card support. If you pick the oneTeslaTS kit option you don't need this, since the SD card interrupter is already included with your kit.
Super early bird special! Round 1 of the tinyTesla kit rewards.

Early bird special! Round 2 of the tinyTesla kit rewards: everything you need to build a little desktop musical Tesla coil. Add $49 for a replacement parts set, $10 for a printed manual, and $35 for a graphic tee included in your kit! Get any second kit for the Round 1 price: just add the amount to your pledge!

Round 3 of tinyTesla kit rewards: everything you need to build a little desktop musical Tesla coil. Add $49 for a replacement parts set, $10 for a printed manual, and $35 for a graphic tee included in your kit! Get any second kit for the Round 1 price: just add the amount to your pledge!

Round 4 of tinyTesla kit rewards: everything you need to build a little desktop musical Tesla coil. Add $49 for a replacement parts set, $10 for a printed manual, and $35 for a graphic tee included in your kit! Get any second kit for the Round 1 price: just add the amount to your pledge!

Round 5 of tinyTesla kit rewards. Add $49 for a replacement parts set, $10 for a printed manual, and $35 for a graphic tee included in your kit! Get any second kit for the Round 1 price: just add the amount to your pledge!
Pre-soldered tinyTesla kit! Just wind, bolt, glue, plug in, and watch the sparks fly. Perfect for demos.
Round 2 pre-soldered tinyTesla kit! Just wind, bolt, glue, plug in, and watch the sparks fly. Perfect for demos.

Super early bird special! Round 1 rewards of the oneTeslaTS kit. Add $99 for a replacement parts set, $10 for a printed manual, $35 for a graphic tee. Get any second kit for the Round 1 price: just add the amount to your pledge!

Early bird special! Round 2 rewards of the oneTeslaTS kit. Add $99 for a replacement parts set, $10 for a printed manual, $35 for a graphic tee. Get any second kit for the Round 1 price: just add the amount to your pledge!

Round 3 rewards of the oneTeslaTS kit. Add $99 for a replacement parts set, $10 for a printed manual, $35 for a graphic tee. Get any second kit for the Round 1 price: just add the amount to your pledge!
